description:
This is a compilation of games for the ABC 80 computer.

The following games require a joystick to play:

  • Star Wars is an action game in which the player engages in a space dogfight. The player must try to align the sights of their weapon with the imperial ship and shoot them down. There are multiple difficulty levels. The player loses health and points when hit and gains points when shooting down an enemy ship. Enemy ships can also escape for a loss of points.
  • Luffs is a computer version of Tic-Tac-Toe.
  • Breakout is a computer port of the classic brick breaking action game. The player controls a paddle and bounces a ball at bricks to score points.
  • Life is an implementation of Conway's Game of Life.
  • Invasion is an action game in which the player must fight of an invasion of enemy ships. The player starts with 100 points and loses a point for each time they fire. Large amounts of points are gained for hitting and destroying enemy ships. Large amounts of points are lost when getting hit by their bombs or nuclear charges.
  • Othello is a computer implementation of the classic game in which players take turns putting their tokens on the board and flipping any enclosed markers to their color. The goal is to have the most board coverage at the end of the game.

The following games can be played without a joystick:

  • Tanks is a two-player game. Both players control a tank and must try to hit the opponent 10 times. Players have unlimited ammo.
  • A Day at the Races: Solvalla is a horse-betting game.
  • Enigma is a mysterious puzzle game with no instructions.
  • Skjuta Stjärnor (Starshot!) is a variant of the Lights Out formula where a certain pattern needs to be achieved in a grid, but changing one tile also affects adjacent tiles.
  • Korsord is a wordfinder game. One player can enter a bunch of text and the game will place the words in a grid with other random characters surrounding them. The game can then be played by another player, either on screen or using a printer.
  • Aforism is a random sentence generator.
  • Grafdemo is a graphics demo.
  • Snirkel is a screensaver-type of animation of a snake crawling along the screen and growing longer and longer. There are five different backgrounds to choose from.
